notes: Data label map for globals and tables. Keep names unique per program.

entries.name: screen_width_f
entries.comment: Float screen width used for UI/layout (set from config_screen_width).

entries.name: console_prompt_string
entries.comment: Console prompt string used for input rendering.

entries.name: tutorial_hint_index
entries.comment: Tutorial hint index used for secondary prompt overlay (increments when bonus object deactivates).

entries.name: default_player_name
entries.comment: Default player name string copied into config on load.

entries.name: tutorial_empty_string
entries.comment: Tutorial string sentinel (empty/guard string used for skipped entries).

entries.name: file_mode_read_binary
entries.comment: CString "rb" used for config/status file reads.

entries.name: file_mode_write_binary
entries.comment: CString "wb" used for config/status file writes.

entries.name: effect_uv_step_2
entries.comment: Effect UV step for 2x2 atlas (size code 0x80)

entries.name: effect_uv_step_4
entries.comment: Effect UV step for 4x4 atlas (size code 0x40)

entries.name: effect_uv_step_8
entries.comment: Effect UV step for 8x8 atlas (size code 0x20)

entries.name: effect_uv_step_16
entries.comment: Effect UV step for 16x16 atlas (size code 0x10)

entries.name: effect_id_size_code
entries.comment: Effect id table size code (stride 0x08 bytes)

entries.name: sfx_rate_scale
entries.comment: SFX playback rate scale (set during sfx_play; affected by Reflex Boost).

entries.name: input_primary_latch
entries.comment: Primary input edge latch used by input_primary_just_pressed.

entries.name: crt_ctype_table
entries.comment: CRT ctype lookup table pointer (used by crt_isctype).

entries.name: crt_dosmaperr_table
entries.comment: CRT dosmaperr table (Win32 error -> errno mapping).

entries.name: console_input_ready
entries.comment: Console input ready flag (set when Enter pressed).

entries.name: console_log_queue
entries.comment: Console log/list head used by console_printf.

entries.name: ui_button_table_a
entries.comment: UI button struct array (stride 0x18) used by ui_button_update.

entries.name: ui_button_table_b
entries.comment: UI button struct array (stride 0x18) used by ui_button_update.

entries.name: config_music_disabled
entries.comment: Config: music disabled flag (1 disables music init).

entries.name: config_highscore_duplicate_mode
entries.comment: Config: high-score duplicate handling (1 replaces existing entry).

entries.name: config_hud_indicator_toggle
entries.comment: Config: per-player HUD indicator toggle (u8[2], gates extra indicator pass).

entries.name: config_fx_detail_flag0
entries.comment: Config: FX detail flag (set by config_detail_preset).

entries.name: config_fx_detail_flag1
entries.comment: Config: FX detail flag (set by config_detail_preset).

entries.name: config_fx_detail_flag2
entries.comment: Config: FX detail flag (set by config_detail_preset).

entries.name: config_player_count
entries.comment: Config: player count (loop bound in per-player logic).

entries.name: config_player_mode_flags
entries.comment: Config: per-player mode flags; value 4 triggers alternate HUD draw and movement scheme checks.

entries.name: config_aim_scheme
entries.comment: Config: aim scheme selector (value 4 enables analog aim axis).

entries.name: config_player_name_buf
entries.comment: Config: player name buffer (char[12]) copied on load; limited usage so far.

entries.name: config_saved_names
entries.comment: Config: saved names table (8 entries × 0x1b bytes).

entries.name: config_player_name
entries.comment: Config: player name (copied to runtime player_name on load).

entries.name: config_player_name_length
entries.comment: Config: player name length (mirrored to runtime on load).

entries.name: config_display_bpp
entries.comment: Config: display color depth (bits per pixel).

entries.name: config_keybind_table
entries.comment: keybind table (2x16 dwords) inside config blob

entries.name: config_full_version
entries.comment: Config: full-version/unlimited flag (gates quest logic/UI strings).

entries.name: config_perk_prompt_state
entries.comment: Config: perk prompt state (reset when counter rolls).

entries.name: config_score_load_gate
entries.comment: Config: score-load gating flag (used with config_highscore_date_mode).

entries.name: config_detail_preset
entries.comment: Config: detail preset driving FX detail flags.

entries.name: config_key_pick_perk
entries.comment: Config: keybind for perk selection (level-up prompt).

entries.name: ui_button_table_c
entries.comment: UI button struct array (stride 0x18) used by ui_button_update.

entries.name: perk_choice_ids
entries.comment: Perk choice table filled by perks_generate_choices.

entries.name: grim_interface_ptr
entries.comment: Grim interface pointer used for input queries (vtable +0x58/+0x80).

entries.name: frame_dt
entries.comment: Frame delta time (seconds) used for effect timers and movement updates.

entries.name: frame_dt_ms
entries.comment: Frame delta time (ms) used for UI/timeline accumulation.

entries.name: tutorial_repeat_spawn_count
entries.comment: Tutorial repeat spawn counter (stage 5 creature/bonus loop).

entries.name: tutorial_hint_bonus_ptr
entries.comment: Current tutorial bonus object pointer used for hint overlay checks.

entries.name: tutorial_hint_alpha
entries.comment: Tutorial hint alpha timer (0..1000) for secondary overlay.

entries.name: game_paused_flag
entries.comment: Pause toggle; when nonzero gameplay updates are skipped in the main loop.

entries.name: ui_pulse_timer_ms
entries.comment: UI pulse timer in ms (used for sine-based effects).

entries.name: plugin_interface_ptr
entries.comment: Modal/plugin interface pointer used when game_state_id == 0x16.

entries.name: creature_type_texture
entries.comment: Creature type table: texture handle (stride 0x44 bytes).

entries.name: quest_spawn_count
entries.comment: Quest spawn table entry count (used by quest_spawn_timeline_update).

entries.name: quest_selected_builder
entries.comment: Current quest builder function pointer (runs quest script).

entries.name: camera_offset_x
entries.comment: Camera offset X applied to world positions for rendering.

entries.name: camera_offset_y
entries.comment: Camera offset Y applied to world positions for rendering.

entries.name: creature_spawn_slot_owner
entries.comment: Spawn slot owner creature pointer (stride 0x18 bytes; indexed by creature_link_index).

entries.name: creature_spawn_slot_count
entries.comment: Spawn slot current count (stride 0x18 bytes; indexed by creature_link_index).

entries.name: bonus_meta_enabled
entries.comment: Bonus metadata enabled flag (bonus_meta_label + 0x0c); id 0 is disabled.

entries.name: game_sequence_id
entries.comment: Saved game sequence id loaded from registry.

entries.name: quest_spawn_table
entries.comment: Quest spawn table base (entries used by quest_spawn_timeline_update).

entries.name: survival_reward_handout_enabled
entries.comment: Survival handout gate (set on reset; cleared after reward or after 3 death samples).

entries.name: perk_pending_count
entries.comment: Pending perk picks; incremented on level-up and decremented on perk selection.

entries.name: shock_chain_links_left
entries.comment: Shock Chain link counter; decremented on each chained hit.

entries.name: shock_chain_projectile_id
entries.comment: Projectile index for the active Shock Chain segment.

entries.name: survival_spawn_cooldown
entries.comment: Survival spawn cooldown accumulator (counts down to next burst).

entries.name: plaguebearer_infection_count
entries.comment: Plaguebearer infection kill counter (used to cap contagion spread).

entries.name: creature_active_count
entries.comment: Active creature count (set each creature_update_all pass).

entries.name: quest_spawn_timeline
entries.comment: Quest spawn timeline (elapsed ms for quest triggers).

entries.name: tutorial_stage_timer
entries.comment: Tutorial stage timer (ms) used for fade/auto-advance.

entries.name: survival_reward_fire_seen
entries.comment: Set when the player fires; gates survival weapon rewards (cleared when 3 deaths recorded).

entries.name: survival_reward_damage_seen
entries.comment: Set on player damage; gates survival weapon rewards.

entries.name: survival_recent_death_pos_x
entries.comment: Survival reward tracking: recent creature death X positions (3 entries, stride 8 bytes).

entries.name: survival_recent_death_pos_y
entries.comment: Survival reward tracking: recent creature death Y positions (3 entries, stride 8 bytes).

entries.name: survival_recent_death_count
entries.comment: Survival reward tracking: recent creature death counter (counts to 6, stores 3 positions).

entries.name: creatures_any_active_flag
entries.comment: Creature pool active flag cached by creatures_none_active().

entries.name: demo_mode_active
entries.comment: Demo/attract mode flag; disables HUD and alters update behavior.

entries.name: time_scale_active
entries.comment: Time-scale active flag (set while Reflex Boost is active).

entries.name: time_scale_factor
entries.comment: Time-scale factor applied to frame dt when Reflex Boost is active.

entries.name: bonus_weapon_power_up_timer
entries.comment: Global Weapon Power Up timer (bonus id 4).

entries.name: bonus_spawn_guard
entries.comment: Nonzero while bonus/perk effects spawn projectiles; skips bonus drop logic.

entries.name: highscore_active_record
entries.comment: Active high score record buffer (0x48 bytes).

entries.name: creature_kill_count
entries.comment: Total creature kills (incremented on creature death paths).

entries.name: terrain_texture_failed
entries.comment: Terrain texture creation failure flag (safe mode).

entries.name: ui_mouse_blocked
entries.comment: UI mouse blocking flag checked by ui_mouse_inside_rect.

entries.name: camera_shake_offset_x
entries.comment: Camera shake offset X (applied to camera center).

entries.name: camera_shake_offset_y
entries.comment: Camera shake offset Y (applied to camera center).

entries.name: camera_shake_timer
entries.comment: Camera shake timer; counts down between shake pulses.

entries.name: camera_shake_pulses
entries.comment: Camera shake pulse counter; decremented as shake pulses complete.

entries.name: player_name_length
entries.comment: Player name length (runtime, copied from config).

entries.name: render_pass_mode
entries.comment: Render pass mode gate; 0 triggers terrain-only pass.

entries.name: ui_transition_direction
entries.comment: UI transition direction flag (0 = countdown, nonzero = count up).

entries.name: screen_fade_alpha
entries.comment: Fullscreen fade alpha used by grim_draw_fullscreen_color.

entries.name: game_state_prev
entries.comment: Previous game state id set before transitions.

entries.name: game_state_id
entries.comment: Current game state id checked by update/render loops.

entries.name: game_state_pending
entries.comment: Pending transition target set before ui_elements_update_and_render switches state.

entries.name: ui_transition_alpha
entries.comment: UI transition alpha computed from ui_elements_timeline.

entries.name: ui_element_table_end
entries.comment: UI element table end pointer (iterated by ui_elements_update_and_render).

entries.name: ui_element_table_start
entries.comment: UI element table start pointer (iterated by ui_elements_update_and_render).

entries.name: terrain_render_target
entries.comment: Terrain render target index/handle used by grim_set_render_target.

entries.name: bonus_hud_slot_active
entries.comment: Bonus HUD slot active flag array (stride 0x20 bytes).

entries.name: bonus_hud_slot_alt_timer_ptr
entries.comment: Bonus HUD slot alternate timer pointer (bonus_hud_slot_active + 0x10); used for player 2 timers.

entries.name: bonus_hud_slot_label
entries.comment: Bonus HUD slot label string pointer (bonus_hud_slot_active + 0x14).

entries.name: bodyset_texture
entries.comment: Texture handle for bodyset atlas (fx_queue_render / corpse frame atlas).

entries.name: ui_weapon_icons_texture
entries.comment: Texture handle for ui_wicons.png (weapon icon atlas).

entries.name: particles_texture
entries.comment: Texture handle for particles atlas (game_particles.jaz / particles.png).

entries.name: survival_xp_smoothed
entries.comment: Smoothed survival XP value used by HUD progress display.

entries.name: fx_queue_random_color_r
entries.comment: Randomized grayscale color R used by fx_queue_add helper FUN_00427700.

entries.name: fx_queue_random_color_g
entries.comment: Randomized grayscale color G used by fx_queue_add helper FUN_00427700.

entries.name: fx_queue_random_color_b
entries.comment: Randomized grayscale color B used by fx_queue_add helper FUN_00427700.

entries.name: fx_queue_random_color_a
entries.comment: Randomized color alpha used by fx_queue_add helper FUN_00427700.

entries.name: fx_rotated_pos_x
entries.comment: Rotated FX queue position X array

entries.name: fx_rotated_pos_y
entries.comment: Rotated FX queue position Y array

entries.name: bonus_pool_sentinel
entries.comment: Bonus pool sentinel pointer returned by bonus_alloc_slot/bonus_spawn when no slot is available.

entries.name: player_plaguebearer_active
entries.comment: Per-player Plaguebearer perk active flag (checked in creature_update_all, set in perk_apply).

entries.name: player_weapon_reset_latch
entries.comment: Per-player weapon reset latch (player_health + 0x3c); cleared when weapon timers/ammo are reset.

entries.name: player_experience
entries.comment: Per-player experience points (XP) used for level-ups, survival scaling, and Regression Bullets/Ammunition Within costs.

entries.name: player_level
entries.comment: Per-player level/perk tier; increments when XP crosses thresholds and gates survival wave milestones.

entries.name: player_perk_counts
entries.comment: Per-player perk count table (0x80 ints), indexed by perk id; stride 0x360 bytes.

entries.name: player_muzzle_flash_alpha
entries.comment: Per-player muzzle flash / weapon glow intensity; decays each frame and accumulates on fire.

entries.name: player_turn_speed
entries.comment: Per-player turn speed accumulator for keyboard/tank controls (player_health + 0x2e0)

entries.name: player_state_aux
entries.comment: Per-player aux state (player_health + 0x2e4); zeroed in player reset, no read sites yet.

entries.name: evil_eyes_target_creature
entries.comment: Creature index targeted by Evil Eyes perk; set in FUN_00406b40 and read in creature_update_all.

entries.name: player_key_reserved_0
entries.comment: Per-player reserved keybind slot (player_health + 0x31c); copied from config, no callsites found.

entries.name: player_key_reserved_1
entries.comment: Per-player reserved keybind slot (player_health + 0x320); copied from config, no callsites found.

entries.name: player_alt_fire_key
entries.comment: Alternate primary fire key (checked by input_primary_is_down)

entries.name: player_alt_key_reserved_0
entries.comment: Per-player reserved alt keybind slot (player_health + 0x37c); copied from config, no callsites found.

entries.name: player_alt_key_reserved_1
entries.comment: Per-player reserved alt keybind slot (player_health + 0x380); copied from config, no callsites found.

entries.name: player_alt_key_reserved_2
entries.comment: Per-player reserved alt keybind slot (player_health + 0x384); copied from config, no callsites found.

entries.name: player_alt_key_reserved_3
entries.comment: Per-player reserved alt keybind slot (player_health + 0x388); copied from config, no callsites found.

entries.name: effect_uv8_u
entries.comment: Effect UV table U for 8x8 atlas frames

entries.name: effect_uv8_v
entries.comment: Effect UV table V for 8x8 atlas frames

entries.name: effect_uv4_u
entries.comment: Effect UV table U for 4x4 atlas frames

entries.name: effect_uv4_v
entries.comment: Effect UV table V for 4x4 atlas frames

entries.name: effect_uv2_u
entries.comment: Effect UV table U for 2x2 atlas frames

entries.name: effect_uv2_v
entries.comment: Effect UV table V for 2x2 atlas frames

entries.name: local_system_time
entries.comment: SYSTEMTIME scratch written by GetLocalTime; year/month used for high score stamps and seasonal checks.

entries.name: local_system_day
entries.comment: SYSTEMTIME.wDay field (day-of-month) used with local_system_time for date checks.

entries.name: secondary_projectile_pool
entries.comment: Secondary projectile pool base (0x40 entries, stride 0x2c)

entries.name: fx_rotated_effect_id
entries.comment: Rotated FX queue effect id array

entries.name: fx_rotated_color_r
entries.comment: Rotated FX queue color R array

entries.name: fx_rotated_color_g
entries.comment: Rotated FX queue color G array

entries.name: fx_rotated_color_b
entries.comment: Rotated FX queue color B array

entries.name: fx_rotated_color_a
entries.comment: Rotated FX queue color A array

entries.name: effect_uv16_u
entries.comment: Effect UV table U for 16x16 atlas frames

entries.name: effect_uv16_v
entries.comment: Effect UV table V for 16x16 atlas frames

entries.name: key_char_buffer
entries.comment: Key char ring buffer for grim_set_key_char_buffer.

entries.name: render_overlay_player_index
entries.comment: Player index used for overlay rendering passes.

entries.name: fx_queue_count
entries.comment: FX queue length (fx_queue entry count, capped at 0x7f).

entries.name: creature_update_tick
entries.comment: Creature update tick counter used to throttle target recalculation.

entries.name: effect_template_vel_x
entries.comment: Effect template vel_x (effect template block base)

entries.name: effect_free_list_head
entries.comment: Effect pool free list head pointer

entries.name: perk_id_bloody_mess_quick_learner
entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Bloody Mess / Quick Learner.

entries.name: perk_id_instant_winner
entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Instant Winner.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Long Distance Runner.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Reflex Boosted.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Grim Deal.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Alternate Weapon.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Ammo Maniac.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Lean Mean Exp Machine.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Evil Eyes.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Anxious Loader.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Final Revenge.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Infernal Contract.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Perk Expert.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Perk Master.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Bonus Magnet.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Mr. Melee.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Greater Regeneration.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Veins of Poison.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Toxic Avenger.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Thick Skinned.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Breathing Room.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Ammunition Within.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Regression Bullets.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Monster Vision.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Bonus Economist.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Poison Bullets.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Hot Tempered.

entries.name: perk_id_uranium_filled_bullets
entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Uranium Filled Bullets.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Random Weapon.

entries.name: perk_id_fatal_lottery
entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Fatal Lottery.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Ion Gun Master.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Stationary Reloader.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for My Favourite Weapon.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Angry Reloader.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Man Bomb.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Living Fortress.

entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Fire Caugh.

entries.name: perk_id_tough_reloader
entries.comment: Perk ID constant for Tough Reloader.

entries.name: perk_name_table
entries.comment: Perk name pointer table (stride 0x14 bytes per perk).

entries.name: sfx_cooldown_table
entries.comment: SFX cooldown table (per-id throttle used by sfx_play).

entries.name: sfx_voice_table
entries.comment: SFX voice/handle table cleared during sfx_system_init.

entries.name: sfx_shock_fire_alt
entries.comment: Duplicate SFX id for shock_fire.ogg (secondary slot).

entries.name: sfx_autorifle_reload_alt
entries.comment: Duplicate SFX id for autorifle_reload.ogg (secondary slot).

entries.name: music_track_extra_0
entries.comment: Music track id for extra track (+1 from intro).

entries.name: music_track_extra_1
entries.comment: Music track id for extra track (+2 from intro).

entries.name: sfx_volume_table
entries.comment: Per-SFX volume table updated by sfx_play_exclusive and sfx_update_mute_fades.

entries.name: sfx_mute_flags
entries.comment: Per-SFX mute flag table (set by sfx_mute_all).

entries.name: sfx_entry_table
entries.comment: SFX entry table base (iterated by sfx_release_all).

entries.name: sfx_entry_table_state
entries.comment: SFX entry table state/slot base used by sfx_play and sfx_load_sample.

entries.name: sfx_unmuted_flag
entries.comment: Global SFX unmuted flag checked by sfx_is_unmuted.

entries.name: ui_focus_candidates
entries.comment: UI focus candidate list used by ui_focus_update.

entries.name: weapon_ammo_class
entries.comment: Weapon table ammo class/HUD indicator (weapon_table - 0x04, stride 0x7c).

entries.name: effect_subrect_frame_table
entries.comment: Effect frame table used for grim_set_sub_rect selection.

entries.name: weapon_projectile_meta
entries.comment: Weapon table projectile meta value (weapon_table + 0x6c, stride 0x7c)

entries.name: weapon_projectile_damage_scale
entries.comment: Weapon table projectile damage scale (weapon_table + 0x70, stride 0x7c)

entries.name: weapon_projectile_pellet_count
entries.comment: Weapon table projectile pellet count (weapon_table + 0x74, stride 0x7c)

entries.name: crt_heap_mode
entries.comment: CRT heap mode flag used by crt_free paths.

entries.name: grim_bound_texture_handle
entries.comment: Currently bound texture handle (set by grim_bind_texture).

entries.name: grim_font2_texture_handle
entries.comment: Texture handle for GRIM_Font2 (small font atlas).

entries.name: grim_frame_dt
entries.comment: Frame delta time (seconds) used for input decay.

entries.name: grim_vertex_capacity
entries.comment: Vertex/index capacity used for dynamic buffers.

entries.name: grim_rotation_radians
entries.comment: Current rotation radians for draw helpers.

entries.name: grim_vertex_write_ptr
entries.comment: Vertex write pointer used after Lock().

entries.name: grim_texture_format
entries.comment: D3D texture format used for CreateTexture.

entries.name: grim_line_dx
entries.comment: Line delta X used by draw helpers.

entries.name: grim_line_dy
entries.comment: Line delta Y used by draw helpers.

entries.name: grim_subrect_table
entries.comment: Atlas sub-rect table referenced by pointer table.

entries.name: grim_printf_buffer
entries.comment: Formatted text buffer used by draw_text (vsprintf).

entries.name: grim_printf_buffer_alt
entries.comment: Alternate formatted text buffer for draw_text.

entries.name: grim_uv_u0
entries.comment: Current UV u0 for quad draws.

entries.name: grim_uv_v0
entries.comment: Current UV v0 for quad draws.

entries.name: grim_uv_u1
entries.comment: Current UV u1 for quad draws.

entries.name: grim_uv_v1
entries.comment: Current UV v1 for quad draws.

entries.name: grim_d3d8_probe
entries.comment: Temporary IDirect3D8 pointer used to sanity-check Direct3DCreate8.

entries.name: grim_font2_uv_u
entries.comment: Small-font glyph U coordinates (float, indexed by glyph * 2).

entries.name: grim_font2_uv_v
entries.comment: Small-font glyph V coordinates (float, indexed by glyph * 2).

entries.name: grim_subrect_ptr_table
entries.comment: Pointer table base for atlas sub-rects.

entries.name: grim_config_blob
entries.comment: Raw crimson_cfg config blob (0x480 bytes read/write).

entries.name: grim_vertex_count
entries.comment: Current vertex count in the dynamic batch (16-bit).

entries.name: grim_mouse_button_latch
entries.comment: Mouse button latch array for edge detection.

entries.name: grim_error_text
entries.comment: Current Grim2D error string (returned by grim_get_error_text).

entries.name: grim_config_var0_table
entries.comment: Config var table element 0 (id * 4; used by grim_get_config_var).

entries.name: grim_config_var1_table
entries.comment: Config var table element 1 (id * 4; used by grim_get_config_var).

entries.name: grim_config_var2_table
entries.comment: Config var table element 2 (id * 0x10; used by grim_get_config_var).

entries.name: grim_config_var3_table
entries.comment: Config var table element 3 (id * 0x10; used by grim_get_config_var).

entries.name: grim_input_cached
entries.comment: Input cache flag (uses cached mouse state when nonzero).

entries.name: grim_font_texture_bound
entries.comment: Font texture bound flag (nonzero skips SetTexture in draw_text).

entries.name: grim_config_dialog_canceled
entries.comment: Config dialog canceled flag (1 when dialog dismissed).

entries.name: grim_font_texture
entries.comment: Font texture (IDirect3DTexture8) used for text rendering.

entries.name: grim_batch_active
entries.comment: Batch active/locked flag for vertex buffer usage.

entries.name: grim_texture_slots
entries.comment: Texture slot table (array of Grim2D texture pointers; indexed by handle).

entries.name: grim_interface_instance
entries.comment: Singleton Grim2D interface instance (vtable pointer stored at grim_interface_vtable).

entries.name: grim_mouse_state
entries.comment: Mouse state buffer (DIMOUSESTATE2; dx/dy/dz + button bytes).

entries.name: grim_mouse_dx
entries.comment: Mouse delta X (pixels) accumulated per poll.

entries.name: grim_mouse_dy
entries.comment: Mouse delta Y (pixels) accumulated per poll.
